(Simplified: 扪)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
①摸：捫心自問。
捫心自問 [ mén xīn zì wèn ]: to ask oneself honestly; to search in one's heart
捫心無愧 [ mén xīn wú kuì ]: lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience
(Simplified: 扪)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 扪

Original meaning 本义: Meaning feel by hand.

捫字的基本解释

捫
mén
见“扪”。

捫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mén］
［《廣韻》莫奔切，平魂，明。］
“扪1”的繁体字。
(1)执持，按住。
(2)指蒙住。
(3)抚摸。
(4)攀；挽。
(5)揩拭。

捫字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页435第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】謨奔切【韻會】謨昆切，?音門。【說文】撫持也。【詩·大雅】莫捫朕舌。　又摸也。【史記·高祖紀】漢王傷胷，乃捫足。【楚辭·九章】遂儵忽而捫天。　又【韻補】叶眉貧切，音珉。【歐陽修·菱溪石詩】嗟予有口莫能辨，歎息但以兩手捫。皆云女媧初鍛鍊，融結一氣凝精純。　俗作䦐，非。

[①]［mén］

"扪1" in traditional characters.
(1) Hold and hold.

(4) Climbing; pulling.

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Benqie [Yun Hui] Mo Kunqie,? Yinmen. [Said the text] Fu Chi also. 【Poetry·Daya】Mom my tongue.　 Touch it again. 【Historical Records·Gao Zu Ji】The King of Han hurt his corpse and palpated his feet. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] Suddenly, the sky suddenly disappeared.　[Rhyme Replenishment] Ye Mei is poorly cut, Yin Min. 【Ouyang Xiu·Lingxi Stone Poems】Sai Yu has a mouth and can't tell, sighs but palpates with both hands.
